topic: Amazon R6i Instance Types Information

  entities:
  
    r6i|Product
    Amazon R6i instances|Product
    3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors|Product
    Ice Lake|Product
    R5 instance types|Product
  
  proposition: r6i is a family of instance types.
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    
    entity-attributes:
    r6i|IS_TYPE_OF|family of instance types
      
  proposition: Amazon R6i instances are powered by 3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    Amazon R6i instances|POWERED_BY|3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors
  
    entity-attributes:
    
  proposition: 3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors are code named Ice Lake.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors|CODE_NAMED|Ice Lake
  
    entity-attributes:

  proposition: Amazon R6i instances are an ideal fit for memory-intensive workloads.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    Amazon R6i instances|IDEAL_FOR|memory-intensive workloads

  proposition: Amazon R6i instances offer up to 15% better compute price performance than comparable R5 instance types.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    Amazon R6i instances|COMPARED_TO|R5 instance types
  
    entity-attributes:
    Amazon R6i instances|PERFORMANCE_IMPROVEMENT|up to 15% better compute price performance

  proposition: Amazon R6i instances offer up to 20% higher memory bandwidth per vCPU than comparable R5 instance types.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    Amazon R6i instances|COMPARED_TO|R5 instance types
  
    entity-attributes:
    Amazon R6i instances|MEMORY_BANDWIDTH|up to 20% higher memory bandwidth per vCPU

  proposition: R5 instance types are comparable to Amazon R6i instances.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    R5 instance types|COMPARABLE_TO|Amazon R6i instances
  
    entity-attributes:
